name: Dum ki Boti Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Dum ki Boti Recipe: Beef pieces ½ kg Lemon 2 Chopped Green chilies 2 Black pepper 4 Yogurt ½ cup Chopped Mint Leaves ½ bunch Bihari Masala 2 tbsp Oil 3 tbsp
instructions: Marinate Beef with black peppercorn,1 2/ cup yogurt Add Bihari Masala and keep it for 10 minutes. Put them in a frying pan and cook till the water dries. Add in 3 tbsp oil and 2 lemon juice. Cover the pan and cook it on a low flame. In end, add in chopped green chilies and chopped mint leaves. Serve it with parathas.
